email.description: The email of the person invited

first_name.description: The first name of the person invited (optional)

last_name.description: The last name of the person invited (optional)

release_ids.description: An array of IDs representing the releases that are offered

discount_code.description: Auto-apply this discount code when the invitee orders the ticket (optional)

created_at.description: The date this invitation was created.

updated_at.description: The date this invitation was last updated.

redirect.description: What happens if the customer clicks the invitation link after they've ordered. True means they will be redirected to their order, false means they will be shown a "link expired" message. Defaults to false.

slug.description: A human friendly string used in the URL.
